bad: Tumhara time kharab nahi, tumhara software hi corrupted hai.
Aaj ghar se mat nikalna, kutta bhi kaat sakta hai.
Sitaare bol rahe hain ki tumhara kattne wala hai. Sambhal ke.
Shani dev aaj tumhare sar pe Tandav kar rahe hain.
Tumhari kismat 'Chin Tapak Dam Dam' ho gayi hai.
avg: Din thik hai, bas kisi se udhaar mat mangna, pit jaoge.
Kaam chalau kismat hai aaj. Zinda rahoge, shayad.
Aayein? Kismat samajh nahi aa rahi. Normal hi raho.
Tumhara din 'Baigan' jaisa hai. Na acha, na bura.
good: Aaj toh tum Raja ho! Lottery khareed lo.
Tumhara Crush aaj reply karega. Pakka.
Mummy aaj khush hain, jo mangna hai mang lo.
